item.title: A custom std::vector
item.description: Introduction This tutorial expects some basic C++ competency and familiarity with templates. It's meant for "advanced beginners" who want to write idiomatic modern C++. The implementation is meant to be educational, so it won't be comprehensive nor will it be very performant. The main topics we'll cover are: Constructors & destructor Element access functions Modifier functions Class layout We are applying the rule of five here to enable move semantics, which is basically compiler optimizations.
